ai-tha-ap259:1.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap259:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap259:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap259:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap259:3.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.
ai-tha-ap259:4.1_0: Endowed with the other seven offenses.
ai-tha-ap259:4.2_0: I was the one great hermit.
ai-tha-ap259:4.3_0: and name, the lady named Divine.
ai-tha-ap259:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sañjaya.
ai-tha-ap259:7.1_0: for the seventh Elder Nun Piyssa
